base

Class ComPortHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • base.ComPortHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fazecast.jSerialComm.SerialPortDataListener, I_HWI, java.util.EventListener

    public class ComPortHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_HWI, com.fazecast.jSerialComm.SerialPortDataListener
    ComPortHandler

    this class is used as hardware interface for the PCDI, so it sends and receives bytes and notifies the PCDI-Interface
